entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 12:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
